titleStmt.title: A copie of the last aduertisement that came from Malta of the miraculous deliuerie of the isle from the longe sieg[e] of the Turke, both by sea and land ... Translated out of ye Italian tongue, into English.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The deliuery of Malta from the Turke.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
